item.title:
Nick Jonas confirms he and Joe Jonas both auditioned for the role of Fiyero in the ‘WICKED’ movies.
“Joe and I both went out, and we didn’t get it. But I think Jonathan [Bailey] is going to do a great job, and I’m sure the movie is going to be great.”
(https://variety.com/2023/film/features/nick-jonas-director-robert-schwartzman-the-good-half-tribeca-1235634787/…)
